commitResults.messageTitle: Duke Level-5: Handle Errors All Done

Added Throwable parameter to DukeException class to store root error type

Done the main task commands error handling via custom Duke Exceptions

Do KISS & SLAP as much as possible

Import the new package into Duke.java (to use DukeException)

Add import codes for use in Duke and Todo classes

-implement SLAP for methods, switch-cases.
